40+ Years of Experience 300+ Founders Served Over $100M raised

Your Catalyst for Financial Transformation and Success

Talk to an Expert

Choosing the Wrong Financial Strategy Can Be Expensive

We all know that running a successful business is like navigating a minefield. Without proper financial management and strategy, it's easy to veer off course and run into BIG financial problems.

Problems that can cause:

Cash Flow Crisis
A staggering 82% of businesses struggle with inadequate working capital due to poor cash flow management skills and know-how. It's like walking on a tightrope without a safety net. One wrong step and your business could come crashing down. You don't want to stunt your financial stability, do you?
Bookkeeping Blunders
With improper invoicing and record-keeping practices, you're playing a dangerous game of numbers that can undermine the trustworthiness of your financial records. No one likes to risk their business's financial integrity or second-guess the credibility of their records
Planning Pitfalls
Inefficient financial planning and forecasting mean you'll be throwing darts in the dark, hoping for a target but never hitting the mark. Your business is held back, progress is hindered, and potential remains untapped.
Competency Gap
Limited resources and the right expertise to handle complex financial tasks can shatter your business's core functions. The fallout? Missed opportunities, stress overload, and a fight to keep your business whole.

Don't Gamble With Your Business's Future!

At Stellar Consultancy, we specialize in guiding businesses like yours toward financial prosperity. Our financial specialists will help you chart a well-defined path, maximize your resources, and make every penny count.

With our industry-leading virtual CFO, bookkeeping, and accounting services, we deliver a strategic blend of financial expertise, meticulous attention to detail, and scalable solutions designed to ignite business growth, safeguard your bottom line, and set you on a trajectory for lasting success.

Say goodbye to the burden of in-house bookkeepers and accountants, and save costs without compromising on quality with us.

Here's How We Fuel Your Business's Financial Performance

Financial Planning and Forecasting

Gain crystal clarity and control over your financial future with our laser-focused planning and forecasting services. We'll help you sail through the ever-changing financial landscape, anticipate market trends, and steer your business toward sustained growth and revenue generation.

Bookkeeping and Accounting

Experience peace of mind as we handle the nitty-gritty of your bookkeeping and accounting in a timely and accurate manner. We'll keep your financial records in impeccable order, ensuring maximum precision and transparency and giving you the confidence to focus on what you do best – building your business

Financial Analysis and Reporting

Uncover valuable insights into your business's financial health with our comprehensive analysis and reporting services. Our experts will dig deep into your financial data, identify key improvement areas, and provide clear, actionable (monthly/quarterly/annual) reports that empower you to make informed decisions, avoid costly errors, and optimize your financial processes.

Virtual CFO Services

Elevate your financial strategy with our virtual CFO services. Our seasoned professionals will act as your reliable advisors, offering personalized guidance, cutting-edge frameworks, and deep industry knowledge to infuse your business with a new level of financial agility. Whether you're a budding startup or a small and developing business, we'll work closely with you to strengthen your financial foundation and unearth new directions for your operations.

Stories of Trust, Results, and Partnership

Working with Jamal has been great. I'm very pleased with the result. He easily understood what our project was about. I highly recommend Jamal and will definitely work with him again. He is very professional and easy to communicate with. Thank you, Jamal. It's been a pleasure working with you.

Jade Tao
CEO - Clanity

Jamal has been thoroughly professional throughout. We have been quite demanding and going back and forth on our requirements, but he has patiently explained his method and reasoning and we are left with a model we're happy with and can flexibly mold as our business needs evolve over time. Thanks Jamal!

Joey Hext
Co-Founder - BuddyUp

Jamal is the man!!! He's no-nonsense, to the point and my kind of guy. Oh and by the way, he's the best at what he does. He took my choppy direction and created a masterpiece, thank you so much! I will definitely be using his services again.

CEO BR BoardRoom

Jamal was very professional and the delivery of work exceeded my expectation. He knows what he is doing and helps me through the process to deliver the final product. I highly recommend Jamal to anyone to develop a financial model and all work related to Business, Finance, and Accounting.

CEO Sol Carry

An excellent team to work with. Very knowledgeable in all areas ranging from Market Research , Business Plan to Pitch Deck. will certainly recommend to any startup looking for such a service. Great job Jamal & Team !!

CEO RightCliQ

Jamal and his team offer deep and proficient business expertise which we have found to be priceless. In every respect, we are impressed with the amount of effort put into understand our business model and to get inside our target investors mindset. We could not be more happy with his stellar performance on this project. For us this is not going to be just a "gig", rather a strategic relationship that we will value going forward. Thank you again for the incredible job you've done on this.

Winston Graf
CEO of Winston Graf

I am going to repeat myself, so just book immediately Jamal for your financial model or financial plan, you will be so impressed by the job quality. I have placed several orders and I am always so impressed. Thank you, Jamal!

Jean Jacques
CEO Wakanda Messenger

Awesome! I will be hiring Jamal again for future projects! He's the TRUTH for drafting financial projections for large corporate companies, i.e. Biotech/BioPharma Thank You So Much Jamal!

Tia Lyles
Founder, LucasPye BIO

I have the utmost respect for Jamal both as a human being and as a professional. He work ethic and the quality of his ouputs are truly industry leading. Having tried many other providers before having had the privilege of meeting Jamal I can inform you that he is a rare find and that I would be more then happy to act as a reference.

Andrew Firmenich
CEO - Quantifying Nature

"Thanks to your planning, our business is funded to the tune of $50M. I highly recommend Jamal to anyone who is looking for a serious business strategist and analyst with a deep understanding of financial modeling"

Jess Davis
CEO, Uberstate

Streamlined Process for Your Financial Success

Discovery Session
We begin by conducting an in-depth consultation to thoroughly understand your business’s unique situation, existing challenges, and desired objectives. This sets the stage for the next step
Customized Blueprint
From the insights gathered, we curate a bespoke proposal outlining the solutions we recommend to solve your most pressing pain points and drive tangible business results.
Efficient Onboarding
Next, our team will reach out to you to gather all the crucial information, set up your accounts and ensure a smooth transition. With a minimum commitment of just 3 months, we lay the groundwork for long-term financial success, leaving no room for delays or disruptions.
Unwavering Support
We believe in building enduring partnerships. That's why you get continuous support and proactive communication with us to keep your finances up-to-date and accurate. We are always available to address your queries and offer the financial clarity and confidence your business needs to thrive.
